src:
Duo Sniper Terbaik di COD Mobile yang Harus Dikuasai
05 Nov 2019, 07:40 by Mansur
2 Sniper Terbaik di COD Mobile
Oketekno – Namanya juga game tembak-tembakan, dimana para pemain harus menguasai sederet senjata yang ada untuk mendapatkan kesempatan menang lebih besar. Akan tetapi bakal lebih baik lagi ketika pemain dapat menguasai senjata jenis tertentu dalam game COD Mobile.
Entah di mode TDM (Team Deathmatch) ataupun Battle Royale, jelas tidak mungkin kan kalau semuanya memegang senjata dengan jenis yang sama? Mungkin kalau AR masih bisa di tolerir, namun jauh lebih baik jika ada salah seorang yang pakai Sniper untuk membidik musuh dari jarak jauh.

Simak Nih: 3 Class Terbaik yang Dukung Kemenangan di Battle Royale COD Mobile

Nah, hampir sama seperti PUBG Mobile dimana dalam game COD Mobile ini jenis Sniper yang ditawarkan tidak terlalu banyak. Namun hampir semuanya mematikan sehingga bingung milih. Jika demikian, jangan khawatir, berikut duo Sniper terbaiknya.
Best Sniper Rifles in COD Mobile


DL Q33




Copyright©Istimewa

Dimasukkan dalam daftar terbaik karena memang senjata Sniper ini sudah bisa didapetin sejak kalian awal main, sehingga bisa dikuasai dengan mudah. Meski sudah terbuka sejak level 1, DL Q33 memiliki damage yang tinggi dan akurasi yang baik, sehingga bisa membantai musuh dengan cepat dan mudah.
Selain itu, kalian juga dapat menambahkan 4 Attachment untuk menambah kekuatan dari sniper tersebut. Bisa menyesuaikan sendiri mana attachment yang diperlukan, karena ada banyak macam pilihannya. Sedangkan untuk Optic, disarankan menggunakan scope tambahan saja, agar memiliki jarak pandang lebih luas.

Ketahui Yuk: 

Deretan Skill Spesial Karakter CODM di Mode Multiplayer yang Wajib Dikenali




M21 EBR




Copyright©Istimewa

Senjata Sniper terbaik di COD Mobile berikutnya yakni M21 EBR. Untuk damage yang dihasilkan tidak sesakit DL Q33, namun dikatakan terbaik karena memiliki fire rate yang lebih tinggi. Jadi bisa dikatakan sniper ini cocok dipakai untuk menembak musuh yang gerak-gerak. Terlebih lagi ketika senjata ini sudah full attachment, jelas saja bakal menjadi pas banget dipakai oleh pemain yang punya pergerakan lincah.
Itulah kedua senjata Sniper terbaik dalam game COD Mobile yang bisa kalian coba pakai di mode Multi Player ataupun saat di mode Battle Royale. Selamat bermain.

text:
The Best Duo Sniper on COD Mobile that Must Be Mastered
05 Nov 2019, 07:40 by Mansur
2 of the Best Sniper on COD Mobile
Oketekno - His name is also a shooting game, where the players must master a series of weapons available to get a greater chance of winning. But it will be even better when the player can master certain types of weapons in the COD Mobile game.
Whether in TDM mode (Team Deathmatch) or Battle Royale, it's clearly not possible right if all of them hold weapons of the same type? Maybe if AR can still be tolerated, but it is far better if there is one who uses Sniper to aim at enemies from a distance.

Listen Here: 3 Best Classes That Support Victory in Battle Royale COD Mobile

Well, almost the same as PUBG Mobile where in this COD Mobile game the types of Sniper offered are not too many. But almost all of them are deadly, so they are confused. If so, don't worry, here's the best Sniper duo.
Best Sniper Rifles in COD Mobile


DL Q33




Copyright © Special

Put in the best list because this Sniper weapon can be captured since you started playing, so it can be mastered easily. Even though it's been open since level 1, DL Q33 has high damage and good accuracy, so it can slaughter enemies quickly and easily.
In addition, you can also add 4 Attachments to increase the strength of the sniper. Can adjust yourself where attachments are needed, because there are many kinds of choices. As for Optics, it is recommended to use additional scope only, so that it has wider visibility.

Let's Know:

Special Skill Rows of CODM Characters in an Identifiable Multiplayer Mode




M21 EBR




Copyright © Special

The best sniper weapon in the next COD Mobile is M21 EBR. The damage done is not as painful as DL Q33, but is said to be best because it has a higher fire rate. So you could say this sniper is suitable for shooting enemies who move. Moreover, when this weapon is full attachment, it is clear that it will be very fitting to be used by players who have agile movements.
Those are the two best Sniper weapons in the COD Mobile game that you can try to use in Multi Player mode or when in Battle Royale mode. Have a nice play.
Also read: 10 Most Deadly Scorestreak Weapons on COD Mobile
